titleStmt.title: A taste of the doctrine of the newly erected exercise at Thomas-Apostles London Which began on Friday the third of this instant December 1652. Modestly propounded to caution the actors. Counsel the hearers. By a lover of verity & unity. Who cordially desireth that old light in measure may increase and flourish, whilst new light in matter, may decrease and vanish.
